thread.title: Anaqua Breaks New Ground with Integrated Patent Drafting
thread.title_full: Anaqua Breaks New Ground with Integrated Patent Drafting - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Anaqua Breaks New Ground with Integrated Patent Drafting
text:
Anaqua partners with TurboPatent® to integrate their intelligent patent development environment, changing the game for patent drafting and prosecution.
Boston, MA
Anaqua – a worldwide leading provider of intellectual property (IP) management software and services – today announced a partnership with TurboPatent® to integrate their patent development environment into Anaqua’s unified IP management platform, offering a quantum leap in patent drafting and prosecution efficiency. Powered by TurboPatent®, the integrated solution – ANAQUA STUDIO – offers patent attorneys and IP professionals a uniquely intelligent, efficient, secure, and collaborative environment, enabling them to focus on the intellectual components of patent drafting without getting bogged down in tedious formatting, word processing, and document preparation tasks.
ANAQUA STUDIO significantly reduces the time and effort required to produce, prosecute, and process a high-quality patent. Combined with Anaqua’s best-in-class IP management platform, clients can now access a comprehensive environment that enhances the entire patent authoring process with intelligent tools for claims, drawings, specifications, and office action responses. This powerful solution dramatically reduces errors and rejections, allowing valuable resources to be used for filing higher quality patents.
“When it comes to drafting patents, attorneys have had no choice but to use old-fashioned tools that waste their time. In a flat fee world, this simply doesn’t make sense”, said Steve Preston, SVP of Marketing at Anaqua. “ANAQUA STUDIO helps attorneys focus on what matters most: writing high quality applications that support maximum claim scope.”
“We are thrilled to partner with Anaqua in bringing this transformative technology to the market. Anaqua’s vision and reach serve as a perfect combination to deliver TurboPatent’s solution to IP professionals for unprecendented quality, productivity, and security,” said James Billmaier, CEO of TuboPatent Corp.
For more information on ANAQUA STUDIO, please visit http://www.anaqua.com .
About Anaqua
Anaqua helps corporations and law firms turn intellectual property into competitive advantage. Our software platform, ANAQUA, unifies the critical tools, best practice workflows, data, documents, and services into one intelligent environment, enabling our clients to make smarter and faster decisions. Nearly a million IP professionals in over 150 countries use ANAQUA to manage more than a billion dollars in intellectual assets. Many of the best known brands and most innovative products were conceptualized, evaluated, protected, and monetized through the ANAQUA platform. Anaqua is a privately-held company headquartered in Boston-US and has major European offices in London-UK and Pau-France as well as offices in other cities in North America, Asia and Europe. The expertise of our ANAQUA Services & Client Services staff, combined with our tested implementation methodology, delivers successful solutions on time and on budget.
About TurboPatent®
TurboPatent Corp. is a venture capital-backed team of entrepreneurs, developers, and patent professionals dedicated to creating a suite of solutions for patent attorneys and corporate IP professionals. TurboPatent has more than 10 years of experience in streamlining and automating the patent process.
For more information on TurboPatent, please visit http://www.turbopatent.co
